author: Staff Reporter
text:
The election Static Surveillance Team (SST) on Tuesday seized cash to the tune of Rs. 4,52,720 during a vehicle check at the Walajah Toll Gate on the National Highway – 48.

Officials said, the team led by Saravanan, revenue inspector, was engaged in vehicle check when they intercepted a two-wheeler. They found that the motorist – Babu of Arcot – was carrying a bag with cash in it. Another person – Saravanan – had accompanied him.

The duo said they were working in a petrol bunk and were taking the cash to another bunk. However, they did not possess sufficient documents to carry the cash, an official said. The team seized the cash and handed it to the district treasury, he said.

With this, a total of Rs. 84,15,197 has been seized in cash. The squads have also seized things including cloth bundles and liquor bottles worth Rs. 29,18,310.
title: Over Rs. 4 lakh seized at Walajah
